GSD.description:
media: meson: vdec: fix possible refcount leak in vdec_probe()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.78 by commit f96ad391d054bd5c36994f98afd6a12cbb5600bf. For more details please see the references link.
